original: 摩訶吠室囉末那野提婆喝囉闍
analyzed: 摩訶吠室囉末那野提婆喝囉闍
translated: Mahā-Vairocana-maṇi-deva-rāja
Dhāraṇī Ritual Manual in One Fascicle
Translated by Prajñā-Rakṣita

original: 1 畫像品畫像品第一若有善男子善女人。
analyzed: 1 畫像品畫像品第一若有善男子善女人。
translated: Chapter on Painting Images, Chapter 1: If there are good men and good women,
who uphold this dhāraṇī,
they should first paint an image.
When painting the image,
one should not use animal glue in the paints,
only use fragrant juice.

original: 白月一日請匠清潔澡浴持齋受八戒。
analyzed: 白月一日請匠清潔澡浴持齋受八戒。
translated: On the first day of the bright fortnight, invite the artisan to cleanse and bathe, observe the precepts, and receive the eight precepts.
When going out, one should have three sets of clothes.
If one goes to the toilet, one should bathe in fragrant hot water.
Also, do not discuss the amount of work done by the hands.
Then take a fine white cloth.
If there is no white cloth, a good fine silk is also acceptable.
One zhang and five chi.
Paint the Heavenly King.

original: 身著七寶金剛莊嚴鉀冑。
analyzed: 身著七寶金剛莊嚴鉀冑。
translated: The body is adorned with the seven treasures and vajra armor.

original: 其左手執三叉戟右手托腰又一本左手捧塔其脚下踏三夜叉鬼。
analyzed: 其左手執三叉戟右手托腰又一本左手捧塔其脚下踏三夜叉鬼。
translated: His left hand holds a trident, his right hand rests on his waist, and under his feet he tramples on three yakṣa demons.

original: 中央名地天亦名歡喜天。
analyzed: 中央名地天亦名歡喜天。
translated: The center is called the Heaven of the Earth God, also called the Heaven of Joy.
The left side is called Nilamba.
The right side is called Vilāmba.
The face of the Heavenly King is made to be terrifying.

original: 猛形怒眼滿開其右邊畫五太子及兩部夜叉羅剎眷屬。
analyzed: 猛形怒眼滿開其右邊畫五太子及兩部夜叉羅剎眷屬。
translated: On the right side, paint the five princes, two divisions of yakṣas and rākṣasas, and their retinue.

original: 左邊畫五行道天女及妻等眷屬。
analyzed: 左邊畫五行道天女及妻等眷屬。
translated: On the left side, paint the five heavenly maidens of the path, their wives, and other retinue.
It is as extensively explained in the Mahāvaipulya Sūtra.

original: 2 作壇場品作壇場品第二若欲作壇時。
analyzed: 2 作壇場品作壇場品第二若欲作壇時。
translated: Chapter 2: Creating the Altar, If one wishes to create an altar,
start on the first day of the bright fortnight.

original: 八肘亦六肘八寸此是方壇。
analyzed: 八肘亦六肘八寸此是方壇。
translated: Eight cubits or six cubits and eight inches is the size of a square altar.
Choose an excellent site, dig one zhang deep,
remove bones, tiles, stones, and other evil objects.
Take clean soil elsewhere, compact it firmly, and make it level.
After it is dry, then take fine yellow soil,
mix it with white sandalwood incense powder, and smear it on the altar.

original: 削刮如鏡面即取米粉染五色。
analyzed: 削刮如鏡面即取米粉染五色。
translated: Smooth it like a mirror surface, then take rice powder and dye it five colors.
Draw and create the altar with three enclosed courtyards.

original: 當中央畫一金剛火焰輪又一本云畫一火珠光炎上出四角頭各各畫十字形拔折羅。
analyzed: 當中央畫一金剛火焰輪又一本云畫一火珠光炎上出四角頭各各畫十字形拔折羅。
translated: In the center, draw a vajra flame wheel. Another version says to draw a fire pearl with light and flames, and at the four corners, draw a vajra cross shape.

original: 第二院中央畫火珠光焰上出。
analyzed: 第二院中央畫火珠光焰上出。
translated: In the second courtyard, in the center, draw a fire pearl with light and flames above.

original: 東南面畫三叉鈷戟西南面畫一君遲。
analyzed: 東南面畫三叉鈷戟西南面畫一君遲。
translated: In the southeast, draw a trident halberd. In the southwest, draw a staff.
In the mouth of the vase, place a lotus flower.
In the northwest, draw a large conch shell.

original: 第三院中東面畫師子王。🔽南面畫龍王。
analyzed: 第三院中東面畫師子王。 南面畫龍王。
translated: In the third courtyard, in the east, draw a lion king.🔽In the south, draw a dragon king.
In the west, draw a peacock king.

original: 北面畫夜叉王柱杖立地。
analyzed: 北面畫夜叉王柱杖立地。
translated: In the north, draw a yakṣa king standing on a staff.

original: 又壇四角各各著一香水瓶。
analyzed: 又壇四角各各著一香水瓶。
translated: Also, in the four corners of the altar, place a fragrant water vase.

original: 其瓶口中著雜輕菓子及花葉等。
analyzed: 其瓶口中著雜輕菓子及花葉等。
translated: In the mouth of the vase, place light fruits and flowers, leaves, etc.

original: 然後呪師洗浴著新淨衣。
analyzed: 然後呪師洗浴著新淨衣。
translated: Then the mantra master bathes and puts on new clean clothes.

original: 於天王像前設種種香花飲食。
analyzed: 於天王像前設種種香花飲食。
translated: In front of the image of the Heavenly King, set up various incense, flowers, and food and drink.

original: 供養訖呪訶梨勒一百八顆。
analyzed: 供養訖呪訶梨勒一百八顆。
translated: After making offerings, recite the mantra over one hundred and eight harītakī fruits.
Recite the mantra over each fruit and burn it in the fire until it is finished.
He would then send a piece of gold every day.
To the mantra master, lacking nothing.
If he obtained gold,

original: 即日盡用供養三寶及貧兒。
analyzed: 即日盡用供養三寶及貧兒。
translated: He would use it all that day to make offerings to the Three Jewels and poor children.
Do not give rise to a stingy mind.

original: 3 結界品結界品第三若欲結界時。
analyzed: 3 結界品結界品第三若欲結界時。
translated: Chapter on Establishing Boundaries, Chapter 3: If you wish to establish boundaries,

original: 先念摩訶毘盧遮那佛一百遍。
analyzed: 先念摩訶毘盧遮那佛一百遍。
translated: First recite the Mahā-Vairocana Buddha one hundred times.
Then establish the boundaries.
Make a great vow and say:
I, so-and-so, wear the five yakṣas on my head.
I trample on the rākṣasas with my feet.

original: 仰啟盡虛空遍法界一切諸佛菩薩。
analyzed: 仰啟盡虛空遍法界一切諸佛菩薩。
translated: I respectfully inform all buddhas, bodhisattvas,

original: 金剛密迹力士一切諸善神王。
analyzed: 金剛密迹力士一切諸善神王。
translated: Vajra-secret-attendant-powerful-warriors, and all good spirit kings🔽In the entire Dharma realm of empty space.

original: 天神王地神王山林河海日月五星二十八宿。
analyzed: 天神王地神王山林河海日月五星二十八宿。
translated: Celestial spirit kings, earth spirit kings, mountain forests, rivers, seas, sun, moon, five planets, twenty-eight lunar mansions.

original: 閻羅法王五道將軍太山府君司命司錄。
analyzed: 閻羅法王五道將軍太山府君司命司錄。
translated: King Yama, the five paths' generals, the Lord of the Taishan Prefecture, the Director of Fate, the Director of Records.

original: 怨家債主冥官業道行病鬼王毘首羯摩天子。
analyzed: 怨家債主冥官業道行病鬼王毘首羯摩天子。
translated: Enemies, creditors, underworld officials, ghosts of karmic retribution and illness, the celestial prince Viśvakarman.

original: 五方藥叉大將三天童子七星七宿日月天子。
analyzed: 五方藥叉大將三天童子七星七宿日月天子。
translated: The five directional yakṣa generals, the three celestial children, the seven stars, the seven lunar mansions, and the sun and moon celestial kings.

original: 難陀跋難陀和修吉等諸大龍王皆悉證知。
analyzed: 難陀跋難陀和修吉等諸大龍王皆悉證知。
translated: Nanda, Upananda, Vasuki, and other great nāga kings all bear witness.

original: 我今某甲為欲成就大陀羅尼神驗法門。
analyzed: 我今某甲為欲成就大陀羅尼神驗法門。
translated: I, [name], now wish to accomplish the great dhāraṇī's method of spiritual verification.

original: 唯願如上一切賢聖護念加持。
analyzed: 唯願如上一切賢聖護念加持。
translated: I only pray that the above sages and saints will protect, think of, and empower me.

original: 速得成就悉令歡喜三遍啟請。
analyzed: 速得成就悉令歡喜三遍啟請。
translated: May I quickly attain accomplishment and bring joy to all. Repeat three times to make the request.

original: 又別請五方龍王四大天王二十八部諸鬼神。
analyzed: 又別請五方龍王四大天王二十八部諸鬼神。
translated: Also separately invite the five directional nāga kings, the four great heavenly kings, and the twenty-eight divisions of spirits.
Also separately invite the five directional groups of yakṣas.
First recite the heart mantra, which goes:

original: 婆帝吒一摩訶摩訶嚕二烏呼烏呼三羅阿盡吒帝四莎訶誦二十一遍即成結界若向人家治病之時。
analyzed: 婆帝吒一摩訶摩訶嚕二烏呼烏呼三羅阿盡吒帝四莎訶誦二十一遍即成結界若向人家治病之時。
translated: Batizha mahā mahārū uhu uhu lā ajinzhadi svāhā. Recite twenty-one times to form the boundary. If you are treating someone's illness in their home,
you must first respectfully invite the five directional yakṣas.
The blue emperor yakṣa of the east,

original: 身長三丈二尺口吐青氣　南方赤帝　西方白帝北方黑帝中央黃帝等。
analyzed: 身長三丈二尺口吐青氣　南方赤帝　西方白帝北方黑帝中央黃帝等。
translated: His body is thirty-two feet tall, and he emits blue qi from his mouth. The Red Emperor in the south, the White Emperor in the west, the Black Emperor in the north, and the Yellow Emperor in the center, etc.

original: 身長亦同青帝吐氣依方。
analyzed: 身長亦同青帝吐氣依方。
translated: Their bodies are also the same size as the Blue Emperor's, and they emit qi according to the direction.
They emit qi and invite their retinues.

original: 4 手印品手印品第四1 藥叉立身印藥叉立身印第一以右脚直左脚踏地。
analyzed: 4 手印品手印品第四1 藥叉立身印藥叉立身印第一以右脚直左脚踏地。
translated: Yakṣa standing body mudrā, Yakṣa standing body mudrā 1: Extend the right foot straight and step on the ground with the left foot.
The distance between them is about one cubit.
With the three fingers of the left hand erect,

original: 以大指捻小指甲上託腰。
analyzed: 以大指捻小指甲上託腰。
translated: use the thumb to pinch the tip of the little finger, and rest it on the waist.
The three fingers point forward.
With the five fingers of the right hand,
spread them out on the face, making a scowling expression.
Form a boundary by circling the altar to the right once.
Recite the dhāraṇī once, and then recite the dhāraṇī.

original: 唵一帝婆藥叉二盤陀盤陀三訶呵訶呵四莎訶五2 喚羅剎身印喚羅剎身印第二兩手合掌。🔽二小指相鉤。
analyzed: 唵一帝婆藥叉二盤陀盤陀三訶呵訶呵四莎訶五2 喚羅剎身印喚羅剎身印第二兩手合掌。 二小指相鉤。
translated: Rākṣasa summoning body mudrā, Rākṣasa summoning body mudrā 2: Join the palms with the two little fingers hooked together.
The two thumbs are parallel and touching each other at the wrists.
The index fingers move back and forth.

original: 3 藥叉鉤印藥叉鉤印第三准前身印。
analyzed: 3 藥叉鉤印藥叉鉤印第三准前身印。
translated: Yakṣa hook mudrā, Yakṣa hook mudrā 3: Same as the previous body mudrā.
With the index finger of the right hand,
on the third joint of the middle finger,
above the heart, turn to the right while circumambulating.
All yakshas and their retinue,

original: 皆悉歡喜常為守護事於呪師。
analyzed: 皆悉歡喜常為守護事於呪師。
translated: all will be delighted and always act as guardians for the mantra practitioner.

original: 4 藥叉火輪印藥叉火輪印第四左手中拄右頭指。
analyzed: 4 藥叉火輪印藥叉火輪印第四左手中拄右頭指。
translated: Yaksha Fire Wheel Mudra, Fourth, the left hand supports the right index finger,
the right middle finger supports the left index finger,
the two ring fingers are bent in the palm,
the two joints are facing each other,

original: 二大指二小指並直竪頭相拄。
analyzed: 二大指二小指並直竪頭相拄。
translated: the two thumbs and two little fingers are straight and upright, touching at the tips.
Recite the great heart mantra.

original: 5 藥叉身印藥叉身印第五三藥叉治一切鬼病。
analyzed: 5 藥叉身印藥叉身印第五三藥叉治一切鬼病。
translated: Yaksha Body Mudra, Fifth, the three yakshas cure all ghost illnesses,
they should rely on the body mudra,

original: 與君荼利立身印同。🔽二手兩大指屈於掌中。🔽二無名指壓二大指甲上。
analyzed: 與君荼利立身印同。 二手兩大指屈於掌中。 二無名指壓二大指甲上。
translated: the same as the standing body mudra of Kumbhira.🔽The two thumbs are bent in the palm,🔽the two ring fingers press on the tips of the two thumbs,

original: 頭指中指小指並直竪頭拄。
analyzed: 頭指中指小指並直竪頭拄。
translated: the index, middle, and little fingers are straight and upright, touching at the tips.

original: 翼二肘去乳房五寸誦大身呪。
analyzed: 翼二肘去乳房五寸誦大身呪。
translated: Two cubits on the wings, five inches away from the breasts, recite the great body mantra.

original: 6 大歡喜王印大歡喜王印第六以右手急把左手作棓。
analyzed: 6 大歡喜王印大歡喜王印第六以右手急把左手作棓。
translated: The seal of the Great Joyful King, the sixth, is to tightly grasp the right hand with the left hand, making a club.
Then recite the mantra, which goes:

original: 那上謨枳唎枳唎一俱麼唎二休溜叉溜莎訶若官事急大人瞋怒之時。
analyzed: 那上謨枳唎枳唎一俱麼唎二休溜叉溜莎訶若官事急大人瞋怒之時。
translated: Namo kirī kirī kuṃjārī hūṃ lūṃ lūṃ svāhā. If there is an urgent official matter and a great person is angry,

original: 誦此呪一七遍即大歡喜。
analyzed: 誦此呪一七遍即大歡喜。
translated: recite this mantra seven times, and they will immediately be greatly joyful.

original: 7 縛大鬼印縛大鬼印第七兩手二大指直竪。
analyzed: 7 縛大鬼印縛大鬼印第七兩手二大指直竪。
translated: The seal for binding great ghosts, the seventh, is to straighten the two thumbs of both hands,
bend the left index finger,
and place it at the base of the left thumb,

original: 內右頭指少。🔽曲二手中指下二。🔽指總屈在掌中。
analyzed: 內右頭指少。 曲二手中指下二。 指總屈在掌中。
translated: with the right index finger slightly bent inside.🔽The two middle fingers are bent down,🔽and the two ring fingers and little fingers are all bent in the palm.

original: 8 食印食印第八兩手大指屈頭向下。
analyzed: 8 食印食印第八兩手大指屈頭向下。
translated: The seal for food, the eighth, is to bend the thumbs of both hands down,

original: 二頭指直竪。🔽二中指亦竪少許曲。
analyzed: 二頭指直竪。 二中指亦竪少許曲。
translated: with the two index fingers straight up,🔽and the two middle fingers also slightly bent up.

original: 二無名指二小指並屈在掌中。
analyzed: 二無名指二小指並屈在掌中。
translated: The two ring fingers and little fingers are both bent in the palm.

original: 9 牙印牙印第九兩手二大指向上直竪。
analyzed: 9 牙印牙印第九兩手二大指向上直竪。
translated: 9. Tooth Mudrā, the ninth, with both hands, the two thumbs are extended upward,
and the two middle fingers are also extended.
The left index finger is extended slightly bent,

original: 右頭指屈當左大指上。🔽二中指竪頭相去半寸許。
analyzed: 右頭指屈當左大指上。 二中指竪頭相去半寸許。
translated: and the right index finger is bent to touch the left thumb.🔽The tips of the two middle fingers are separated by half an inch.

original: 二無名指及二小指並屈掌中。
analyzed: 二無名指及二小指並屈掌中。
translated: The two ring fingers and two little fingers are both bent in the palm.

original: 5 護身品護身品第五若欲護身之時。
analyzed: 5 護身品護身品第五若欲護身之時。
translated: Chapter 5: Protecting the Body, if you wish to protect your body,

original: 亦請五方藥叉及大輪金剛。
analyzed: 亦請五方藥叉及大輪金剛。
translated: also invite the Yakṣas of the five directions and Mahācakra Vajra.

original: 即誦大輪金剛陀羅尼二十一遍。
analyzed: 即誦大輪金剛陀羅尼二十一遍。
translated: Then recite the Mahācakra Vajra Dhāraṇī twenty-one times.

original: 并誦天王身呪亦二十一遍。
analyzed: 并誦天王身呪亦二十一遍。
translated: And recite the Heavenly King's Body Spell also twenty-one times.
Then form the protective body spell, saying:

original: 曩謨囉怛曩哆囉夜耶一曩謨吠室囉麼拏野二摩訶囉惹野三怛儞也他　唵󱂛誐赦拏　赦拏　驅努驅努　摩訶囉惹　囉乞灑　𤚥　薩󰂛上鉢捺囉吠毘藥　莎縛訶　誦此呪二十一遍即成護身法。
analyzed: 曩謨囉怛曩哆囉夜耶一曩謨吠室囉麼拏野二摩訶囉惹野三怛儞也他　唵󱂛誐赦拏　赦拏　驅努驅努　摩訶囉惹　囉乞灑　𤚥　薩󰂛上鉢捺囉吠毘藥　莎縛訶　誦此呪二十一遍即成護身法。
translated: Namo ratna trayāya, namo vaiśravaṇāya, mahārājāya, tadyathā - oṃ śānti śānti, kṣema kṣema, mahārāja rakṣa rakṣa, sarva sattvānām apanayaviṣaṃ svāhā. Recite this mantra twenty-one times to accomplish the method of protecting the body.

original: 6 廣大啟請品廣大啟請品第五南謨　薜室囉末拏也　南謨　檀那馱也　檀泥說囉也　阿揭撦　阿鉢唎弭哆　檀泥說囉　鉢囉麼迦留尼迦　薩婆薩埵　呬哆振哆　麼麼自稱名檀那末拏　鉢唎拽撦　碎閻摩揭撦　莎訶誦此呪七遍已。
analyzed: 6 廣大啟請品廣大啟請品第五南謨　薜室囉末拏也　南謨　檀那馱也　檀泥說囉也　阿揭撦　阿鉢唎弭哆　檀泥說囉　鉢囉麼迦留尼迦　薩婆薩埵　呬哆振哆　麼麼自稱名檀那末拏　鉢唎拽撦　碎閻摩揭撦　莎訶誦此呪七遍已。
translated: Chapter 5: Extensive Invocation, Extensive Invocation. Namo vaiśravaṇāya, namo dhanada ya, dhanaprada ya, agni aparyanta dhanaprada prabhākara kula niḥ sarva sattvānām hṛdaya kampaṇa mām nāma dhanam prārthaya svāhā. Recite this mantra seven times.
Next, recite the root mantra.
When reciting the mantra,

original: 先當稱名敬禮三寶及薜室囉末那天王。
analyzed: 先當稱名敬禮三寶及薜室囉末那天王。
translated: First, one should respectfully bow to the Three Jewels and the Heavenly King Vaisravana.

original: 能施財物令諸眾生所求願滿。
analyzed: 能施財物令諸眾生所求願滿。
translated: He is able to bestow wealth and property, fulfilling the wishes of all sentient beings.
He is able to accomplish everything.

Then the king will send someone to summon the mantra practitioner to come quickly, like an arrow.
If you seek the respect and esteem of a high-ranking official,
Take one hundred and eight white mustard seeds.

original: 一顆一呪火中燒滿一百八顆。
analyzed: 一顆一呪火中燒滿一百八顆。
translated: Recite the mantra once for each seed and burn them in the fire until you have completed one hundred and eight seeds.
Then the high-ranking official will respect you like a Buddha and be greatly delighted.

original: 若求大官家婦人等來恭敬者。
analyzed: 若求大官家婦人等來恭敬者。
translated: If you seek the respect and reverence of the wife and others in a high-ranking official's household,
Take ant soil and mix it with sandalwood-scented water.
Make one hundred and eight mud balls.

original: 一顆一呪火中燒滿一百八遍。
analyzed: 一顆一呪火中燒滿一百八遍。
translated: One grain, one spell, burn it in the fire, complete one hundred and eight times.
Then the family will send someone to ask the spell master.

original: 當須何物若有所須必不違惜。
analyzed: 當須何物若有所須必不違惜。
translated: If there is anything needed, they will definitely not be stingy.
Sometimes they will come themselves to respectfully serve the spell master.

original: 若未見呪師時心常憶念也。
analyzed: 若未見呪師時心常憶念也。
translated: If they have not yet seen the spell master, they will always think of him in their hearts.
If one seeks the respect of all families,
one should take one hundred and eight neem seeds.

original: 一顆一呪火中燒滿一百八遍。
analyzed: 一顆一呪火中燒滿一百八遍。
translated: One grain, one spell, burn it in the fire, complete one hundred and eight times.
Then all the families will come.
Respectfully serving the spell master like their own parents.
Whatever they wish for will be fulfilled beyond their expectations.
If one wishes to subdue an enemy,

original: 取昌蒲根呪一百八遍訖。
analyzed: 取昌蒲根呪一百八遍訖。
translated: take some calamus roots, chant the spell one hundred and eight times,
then rub it on one's own face and mouth, and hold it.
There is no enemy that will not submit.
If there is an evil person who troubles the spell master,
think in one's heart of the appearance of Vaiśravaṇa.
Recite the spell once.

original: 未滿即彼惡人不能行動。
analyzed: 未滿即彼惡人不能行動。
translated: If it is not yet full, that evil person will be unable to move.
If you wish to release them,
just think of releasing them.
That person will then return to their original state.

analyzed: 若不欲得怨家共同鄉坊住者。 取苦練木一百八橛子亦得。

original: 一子一呪火中燒一百八遍滿。
analyzed: 一子一呪火中燒一百八遍滿。
translated: Burn them in the fire one hundred and eight times until they are exhausted.
Then that evil person will be unable to stay.

original: 若求諸天大歡喜擁護者。
analyzed: 若求諸天大歡喜擁護者。
translated: If you seek the great joy and protection of the gods,
take ghee, honey, and fruit.
Recite the mantra one hundred and eight times and burn them in the fire.
Then all the gods will be greatly delighted.
If you wish to travel far,
recite the mantra over a grain wood staff and use it to walk.

original: 一切難處皆得安無有障礙。
analyzed: 一切難處皆得安無有障礙。
translated: In all difficult places, you will be at ease and have no obstacles.
If you seek the love and respect of all people,
recite the mantra over a handful of sesame seeds.
Recite the mantra one hundred and eight times and burn them in the fire.
All people will come and pay respect.

original: 若欲入山離一切惡禽獸及諸惡賊者。
analyzed: 若欲入山離一切惡禽獸及諸惡賊者。
translated: If you wish to enter the mountains and avoid all evil birds, beasts, and evil thieves,
take one hundred and eight white mustard seeds.

original: 一顆一呪火中燒及山中散擲。
analyzed: 一顆一呪火中燒及山中散擲。
translated: Burn one seed with each mantra in the fire and scatter it in the mountains.

original: 其一切惡禽獸皆悉隱藏。
analyzed: 其一切惡禽獸皆悉隱藏。
translated: All evil birds and beasts will all hide.
Also, all evil and lowly ones will not be able to raise their heads.
If you wish to beg for rain,
take one hundred and eight apricots.

original: 一顆一呪更都呪二十一遍訖。
analyzed: 一顆一呪更都呪二十一遍訖。
translated: Recite each mantra once and then recite the overall mantra twenty-one times.

analyzed: 即著有龍池水中當時雨下。

recite the mantra over a handful of persimmon seeds and burn them in the fire.

If you wish to beg for food,
first recite the mantra over your alms bowl one hundred and eight times.

original: 所到之處自然得一切飲食。
analyzed: 所到之處自然得一切飲食。
translated: Wherever you go, you will naturally obtain all food and drink.
If you eat the leftovers, they will naturally disappear.

analyzed: 若欲更須食時即至心向鉢呪一遍。

one should fast for one day and one night.
In front of the Buddha, burn incense of benzoin resin.

original: 及呪白花一百八遍散於佛前。
analyzed: 及呪白花一百八遍散於佛前。

The celestial maiden of merit and virtue will appear in person.
All the wealth and treasures sought by the mantra practitioner,
and all matters will be accomplished to one's satisfaction.
If one wishes to avoid all ghosts and spirits,
take white mustard seeds and clarified butter.

analyzed: 一枚一顆一呪滿一百八遍火中燒。

If there is an evil person,

If you wish to seek the respect of all people,

All people who see you will not fail to respect and love you.

analyzed: 若求大福德人來恭敬者。

take some ash, enchant it twenty-one times,
apply it to your own body, and enter the great assembly.
All people who see you will be delighted.

original: 若求遠行不被惡獸傷害者。
analyzed: 若求遠行不被惡獸傷害者。
translated: If you seek to travel far without being harmed by evil beasts,
enchant your left hand.

There will be no obstruction whatsoever.

In front of a stupa containing relics,

If someone is stung by a scorpion,

If a woman suffers from a swollen breast,

Enchant yellow earth twenty-one times,

If a person suffers from a ghost possession,

Three hundred and twenty-one.

translated: If you want to know if there is an Asura cave in the mountains,
Take white mustard seeds and mix them with your own blood,
Chant the mantra once and hit it one thousand and eight times.
Then the mountain cave will open by itself.
The Asura woman will be burning with passion.
Bring various kinds of incense and flowers to take the mantra master.
If the mantra practitioner enters this cave,

original: 壽命一大劫身力還如阿修羅身。
analyzed: 壽命一大劫身力還如阿修羅身。
translated: his lifespan will be one great eon and his physical strength will be like that of an asura.

original: 亦如金剛無能損者若欲出時。
analyzed: 亦如金剛無能損者若欲出時。
translated: It will also be like vajra, and no one will be able to harm him. If he wishes to come out,

original: 亦得阿修羅女隨從送出。
analyzed: 亦得阿修羅女隨從送出。
translated: he will also obtain an asura maiden who will follow him out.
He will return to his original place.
If he seeks invisibility,
he should take this celestial king image

original: 於舍利塔前以香泥塗地。
analyzed: 於舍利塔前以香泥塗地。
translated: in front of a stūpa containing relics and smear the ground with fragrant mud.
He should scatter various fragrant flowers inside the altar.

original: 亦須種種飲食供養天王像訖。
analyzed: 亦須種種飲食供養天王像訖。
translated: He should also make offerings of various food and drink to the celestial king image.

original: 取梨木作合子。🔽取安悉香善那石各作末。🔽和秦膠水作丸。
analyzed: 取梨木作合子。 取安悉香善那石各作末。 和秦膠水作丸。
translated: He should then take jujube wood to make a container.🔽He should take asafetida and realgar and make them into powder.🔽He should mix them with pine resin and make pills.
He should fill the container with them and place it on the altar.
The practitioner should then make a pair of new, clean clothes,
bathe, put on the clothes, and sit in front of the celestial king image.

original: 一日不食誦此呪一千八遍竟。
analyzed: 一日不食誦此呪一千八遍竟。
translated: He should fast for one day and recite this mantra 1,080 times.
He need not trouble himself to manifest the three things.
He should simply recite it 1,080 times.

original: 塗眼上亦塗脚掌心胸前兩膊上訖。
analyzed: 塗眼上亦塗脚掌心胸前兩膊上訖。
translated: Apply it to the eyes, feet, palms, heart, chest, and both shoulders.
Join palms with utmost sincerity.

original: 思念自身猶如虛空無有自身。
analyzed: 思念自身猶如虛空無有自身。
translated: Contemplate one's own body as if it were empty space, without one's own body.

original: 作此想時行者即得隱身。
analyzed: 作此想時行者即得隱身。
translated: When one has this thought, the practitioner will then attain invisibility.

original: 日行千里一切事業皆得成就。
analyzed: 日行千里一切事業皆得成就。
translated: One can travel a thousand miles a day and all endeavors will be accomplished.
If one seeks to subdue non-Buddhists,
and if one's own body is not burned by fire,
take one's own blood and fish blood and mix them together.
With an angry mind, recite the mantra twenty-one times.
Throw it into the fire for the duration of a meal.
One's own body will not be burned by the fire.
If one wishes to subdue non-Buddhists,
form the previous body mudra and act with an angry mind.
Silently recite the mantra one hundred and eight times.
All the magical arts of non-Buddhists
will be completely destroyed and will not be accomplished.

original: 若除毘那夜迦等一切鬼病者。
analyzed: 若除毘那夜迦等一切鬼病者。
translated: If one wishes to eliminate all ghost illnesses such as Vināyakas,
burn agalloch incense with a greatly angry mind.
Quickly recite the mantra.
Hold pomegranate seeds and strike the patient.

original: 其一切鬼病天疫龍疫自然消滅。
analyzed: 其一切鬼病天疫龍疫自然消滅。
translated: All ghost diseases, heavenly epidemics, and dragon epidemics will naturally disappear.
Moreover, if the ritual has not yet been performed,

original: 其病人或歌或咲或坐或走。
analyzed: 其病人或歌或咲或坐或走。
translated: the patient may sing, laugh, sit, or run.
If a powerful ghost leaves after that,

original: 以銅娑羅中著水和灰麵。
analyzed: 以銅娑羅中著水和灰麵。
translated: put water and ash paste in a copper vessel,
and sprinkle it outside the door.

original: 燒安悉香誦呪一百八遍已。
analyzed: 燒安悉香誦呪一百八遍已。
translated: After burning asps incense and reciting the mantra 108 times,
it will not come back to disturb again.
Moreover, if you use a copper vessel,
fill it with ash,
and put white flowers in the ash, it can also be used to cure illnesses.
Moreover, if you want to purify defilements,
you should make an altar.
Smear the altar with cow dung,
two cubits wide and long.
Take a pure and clean boy, wash him,
and have him squat on the altar wearing new white clothes.

original: 童子兩手脚及捻娑羅上。
analyzed: 童子兩手脚及捻娑羅上。
translated: The boy should hold the copper vessel with both hands and feet.

original: 以燒安香薰童子身誦呪。
analyzed: 以燒安香薰童子身誦呪。
translated: Burn asps incense to fumigate the boy's body and recite the mantra.
Then the copper vessel will move.

original: 即其童子自撝示有賊處。
analyzed: 即其童子自撝示有賊處。
translated: The boy will point out where the thieves are.
Among all the methods and techniques mentioned above,

original: 未說手印法所以今時特說印法。
analyzed: 未說手印法所以今時特說印法。
translated: The method of hand mudras has not yet been explained. Therefore, it is specifically explained here.
Cross the two little fingers of the two hands.
Straighten the two ring fingers outward.
Cross the two middle fingers and two index fingers.
Point the two thumbs outward and straighten them.
The palms face each other.

original: 此一色印通用如上所說作法術處也。
analyzed: 此一色印通用如上所說作法術處也。
translated: This one-color mudra is used in all the methods and techniques mentioned above.

original: 吠室囉拏末那野經一卷
analyzed: 吠室囉拏末那野經一卷
translated: Vairocana-mantra Sūtra, 1 fascicle
